title: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones

children.text: Premium over-ear wireless headphones with active noise cancellation and up to 30 hours of battery life.

productSpecifications: Compatible with AAC and SBC codecs

details.value: USB-C charging cable, Travel pouch, 3.5mm audio cable
